sourcesContent:
import { Component, type OnInit } from "@angular/core" import { CommonModule } from "@angular/common" import { ActivatedRoute, RouterModule } from "@angular/router" @Component({ selector: "app-campaign-analytics", standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule], template: `

Campaign Analytics

Campaign ID: {{ campaignId }}

Performance Overview

2,183
Sent
100%
2,150
Delivered
98%
764
Opened
35%
327
Clicked
15%
8
Unsubscribed
0.4%

Detailed analytics charts and data will be displayed here.

This is a placeholder for the full analytics implementation.

`, }) export class CampaignAnalyticsComponent implements OnInit { campaignId = "" constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.campaignId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get("id") || "" } }
